content: Qi Yu | Machine Learning and Data Intensive Computing | RIT RIT Logo with Text Qi Yu Qi Yu, PhD Professor Graduate Program Director, School of Information Director, Machine Learning and Data Intensive Computing Lab I received my Ph.D. from the Department of Computer Science at Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, VA, M.E from National University of Singapore, Singapore, and B.S from Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China.
